description:
You're a busy person.

You don't have time to listen to the standard 9.5 hours of mindless robotic video content.

That's why I'm here.

All I need is an hour and your full attention and I can teach everything you need to know about Final Cut Pro X. As a bonus for giving this course a shot, I'll throw in an entertaining teaching style, witty commentary on time-waisting industry standards, as well as a few extra tips on keeping your computer speedy.
title: Learn Final Cut Pro X Quickly
